section2.title: Online Banking
section2.body: Our modern web and mobile applications allow you to keep track of your finances wherever you are in the world.

section2.title: Simple Budgeting
section2.body: See exactly where your money goes each month. Receive notifications when you’re close to hitting your limits.

section2.title: Fast Onboarding
section2.body: We don’t do branches. Open your account in minutes online and start taking control of your finances right away.

section2.title: Open API
section2.body: Manage your savings, investments, pension, and much more from one account. Tracking your money has never been easier.

section3.body: Our simple budgeting feature allows you to separate out your spending and set realistic limits each month. That means you …

section3.author: Wilson Hutton
section3.title: Take your Easybank card wherever you go
section3.body: We want you to enjoy your travels. This is why we don’t charge any fees on purchases while you’re abroad. We’ll even show you …

section3.title: Our invite-only Beta accounts are now live!
section3.body: After a lot of hard work by the whole team, we’re excited to launch our closed beta. It’s easy to request an invite through the site ...
